channel.title: How do i add a npc!
channel.description: OMFG I CANT BELIVE AFTER ALL MY CODING I FORGET THE BASICS!! HOW DO I ADD A NPC??wich file wt code

item.title: How do i add a npc!
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

woops, didn’t notice code would take the spaces out, well it should look like this:

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-
spawn = 1699 2816 3462 0 2817 3463 2815 3461 2
spawn = 23 2660 3304 0 2662 3306 2658 3302 2
spawn = 23 2662 3309 0 2665 3311 2660 3308 2
spawn = 20 2657 3307 0 2659 3310 2653 3305 2
spawn = 368 3263 3407 0 0 0 0 0 1
spawn = 573 3267 3412 0 3269 3413 3264 3408 1 Herb Shop
spawn = 572 3266 3410 0 3269 3413 3264 3408 1 Ingr[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2007, 12:32:36 AM[/size][hr]if u mean rep++ for me then tyvm i need it lol, but i hope the little quick walkthrough helped i couldnt make it perfect but you should be able to figure it out.

item.title: How do i add a npc!
item.dc:creator: @speedhighway speedhighway
item.description:
@speedhighway wrote:

ya open autospawn.cfg with notepad, you should see a bunch of monster codes. Here let me walk you through it.

When you open that, you should see a list (alot bigger than this)

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 1699 2816 3462 0 2817 3463 2815 3461 2 Ghost spawn = 23 2660 3304 0 2662 3306 2658 3302 2 Knight Of spawn = 23 2662 3309 0 2665 3311 2660 3308 2 Knight Of spawn = 20 2657 3307 0 2659 3310 2653 3305 2 Paladin spawn = 368 3263 3407 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock spawn = 573 3267 3412 0 3269 3413 3264 3408 1 Herb Shop spawn = 572 3266 3410 0 3269 3413 3264 3408 1 Ingredient spawn = 1834 3170 3176 0 0 0 0 0 1 Lumbridge spawn = 844 2681 3325 0 2686 3327 3318 2679 1 East spawn = 553 3253 3402 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Varrock

at the top you see the key (npcid, coordx, ect.) under the last code in the list, type

spawn = then, the first nunber is the npcid, go to moparscape client>help>npc id lookup, type in the monster you want, and type the code into the first number area. next is xcoord and ycoord, both are the cooordinates. Stand in the spot u want ur monster to be on your server, and click on the wrench. Type the coordinates you see at the top right in the two areas. next, for hieght, just enter 0. Then for rangex1, this is the range your monster will roam. If you want him stationary just enter 0. But if you want him to move, enter the range of coords. So if the x coord was 1234, and i wnated a range of 4 spaces, i would enter 1232, and 1236. do the same for the 2 y spots. I’m not sure what walktype is so i usialy enter 1.

THE FINAL RESULT:

spawn = 553	3253	3402	0	3255	3404	3250	3399	1

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add a npc!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Autospawn.cfg

spawn = npcid	xcoord	ycoord height	xcoord	ycoord	xcoord	ycoord	2	Npcname

Example:

spawn = 1552	2610	3096	0	2610	3096	2610	3096	2	SANTA CLAUS

Read full topic
